mapper.select: SELECT r.idx, m.name, a.accom_name, r.check_in_date, r.check_out_date, r.status FROM tbl_reservation r LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member m ON r.member_idx = m.idx LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_accom a ON r.accom_room_idx = a.idx OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
